name: Tinytopia
description:
Imagine a world of your own creation... in miniature form! In Tinytopia use charming toy-like structures to design your ideal city. Build a quaint town and grow it into a soaring metropolis. Plan a well-functioning city to attract all of the surrounding populace. Design your city to weather everything from natural disasters to monster attacks or watch it topple to the floor!

Key Features


  • Whimsical City Planning. A playful blend of old school city building with chaotic whimsy allows players to create towns like never before.
  • God-Complex. Players must protect their tiny creation from tornadoes, fires, meteor showers, monster attacks, and more, but with the flip of a switch, play god and destroy the very city they built.
  • Innovative Building Mechanics. Physics-defying mechanics will allow for buildings to be combined and built on one another to create chaotic or whimsical landscapes.
  • Build Your Way. Players can design imaginary towns, recreate real-world cities like San Francisco, Tokyo, and Paris or if they dare, succeed in fulfilling the demanding criteria of Challenge levels.
